Option.Name: White soul drop attached to ragdoll
Yellow soul drop detatched from ragdoll

behaviorVariationId.Wiki: Determines which BehaviorParam this enemy uses for attacks

nameId.Wiki: Name of the entity. Only appears on the health bar of c0000 characters.

turnVellocity.Wiki: Rotation speed per second[degrees per second].

hitHeight.Wiki: Vertical radius of hitbox used for character to character collision. Requires useRagdoll = false

hitRadius.Wiki: Horizontal radius of hitbox used for character to character collision. Requires useRagdoll = false

hitYOffset.Wiki: Vertical offset of the entity. Will cause them to float.

itemLotId_1.Wiki: ID of ItemLotParam to use for item drops

itemLotId_2.Wiki: ID of ItemLotParam to use for item drops

itemLotId_3.Wiki: ID of ItemLotParam to use for item drops

itemLotId_4.Wiki: ID of ItemLotParam to use for item drops

itemLotId_5.Wiki: ID of ItemLotParam to use for item drops

itemLotId_6.Wiki: ID of ItemLotParam to use for item drops

spEffectID0.Wiki: Special effects that affect this entity

spEffectID1.Wiki: Special effects that affect this entity

spEffectID2.Wiki: Special effects that affect this entity

spEffectID3.Wiki: Special effects that affect this entity

spEffectID4.Wiki: Special effects that affect this entity

spEffectID5.Wiki: Special effects that affect this entity

spEffectID6.Wiki: Special effects that affect this entity

spEffectID7.Wiki: Special effects that affect this entity

GameClearSpEffectID.Wiki: Special effect which is only applied on NG+ and higher. Usually used to scale stats

physGuardCutRate.Wiki: Percentage reduction in physical damage taken while NPC is guarding.

magGuardCutRate.Wiki: Percentage reduction in magic damage taken while NPC is guarding.

fireGuardCutRate.Wiki: Percentage reduction in fire damage taken while NPC is guarding.

thunGuardCutRate.Wiki: Percentage reduction in lightning damage taken while NPC is guarding.

animIdOffset.Wiki: Value to offset animation IDs by. 0 = a00, 10000 = a01, etc.

partsDamageType.Wiki: Determines if weak parts (such as the head) will be affected by all attacks or just arrow attacks.\nHeadshot animation will be used for weak part attacks if it exists.

superArmorRecoverCorrection.Wiki: Change to poise recovery rate. Only the Chained Prisoner uses a non-zero value in vanilla(-0.2).

superArmorBrakeKnockbackDist.Wiki: Stagger knockback distance when NPC's poise is broken.

stamina.Wiki: Maximum stamina. Used for non c0000 enemies blocking in DS1

def_slash.Wiki: Multiplies defense for slash damage. 10 = +10%% defense, -10 = -10%% defense

def_blow.Wiki: Multiplies defense for strike damage. 10 = +10%% defense, -10 = -10%% defense

def_thrust.Wiki: Multiplies defense for thrust damage. 10 = +10%% defense, -10 = -10%% defense

defFlickPower.Wiki: Innate deflection defense. Deflected attacks can have their damage reduced via flickDamageCutRate

superArmorDurability.Wiki: Poise (Requires spEffectParam field dmgLevel to function properly)

dropType.Wiki: Determines behavior and appearance of dropped items.

mpRecoverBaseVel.Wiki: Unknown effect, likely none. Set to zero for NPC parts (tails and Hydra heads) and 10 for everyone else.

flickDamageCutRate.Wiki: Reduces damage received from attacks that have been deflected via defFlickPower. 50 = -50%% damage, 90 = -90%% damage

lockDist.Wiki: Additional maximum lock-on distance added onto base distance defined in LockCamParam

maxUndurationAng.Wiki: Maximum angle enemies can rotate vertically while on slopes. Requires isUnduration

hitStopType.Wiki: Determines how enemy is affected by hitstop.

useRagdollCamHit.Wiki: Causes camera to collide with enemy

useRagdoll.Wiki: If ragdoll is used for character to character collision. If false, hitRadius and hitHeight are used instead

isDemon.Wiki: If enemy will be affected by weapons with antiDemonDamageRate (anti-demon damage).

isGhost.Wiki: True if the entity is a ghost

isUnduration.Wiki: If true, enemies will rotate vertically on slopes. Rotation angle determines by maxUndurationAng

modelDispMask0.Wiki: Toggle for masks within the enemy's model. Used for things like broken body parts, different weapons, second phases, etc.

modelDispMask1.Wiki: Toggle for masks within the enemy's model. Used for things like broken body parts, different weapons, second phases, etc.

modelDispMask2.Wiki: Toggle for masks within the enemy's model. Used for things like broken body parts, different weapons, second phases, etc.

modelDispMask3.Wiki: Toggle for masks within the enemy's model. Used for things like broken body parts, different weapons, second phases, etc.

modelDispMask4.Wiki: Toggle for masks within the enemy's model. Used for things like broken body parts, different weapons, second phases, etc.

modelDispMask5.Wiki: Toggle for masks within the enemy's model. Used for things like broken body parts, different weapons, second phases, etc.

modelDispMask6.Wiki: Toggle for masks within the enemy's model. Used for things like broken body parts, different weapons, second phases, etc.

modelDispMask7.Wiki: Toggle for masks within the enemy's model. Used for things like broken body parts, different weapons, second phases, etc.

modelDispMask8.Wiki: Toggle for masks within the enemy's model. Used for things like broken body parts, different weapons, second phases, etc.

modelDispMask9.Wiki: Toggle for masks within the enemy's model. Used for things like broken body parts, different weapons, second phases, etc.

modelDispMask10.Wiki: Toggle for masks within the enemy's model. Used for things like broken body parts, different weapons, second phases, etc.

modelDispMask11.Wiki: Toggle for masks within the enemy's model. Used for things like broken body parts, different weapons, second phases, etc.

modelDispMask12.Wiki: Toggle for masks within the enemy's model. Used for things like broken body parts, different weapons, second phases, etc.

modelDispMask13.Wiki: Toggle for masks within the enemy's model. Used for things like broken body parts, different weapons, second phases, etc.

modelDispMask14.Wiki: Toggle for masks within the enemy's model. Used for things like broken body parts, different weapons, second phases, etc.

modelDispMask15.Wiki: Toggle for masks within the enemy's model. Used for things like broken body parts, different weapons, second phases, etc.

disableRespawn.Wiki: If true, enemies will not reset position and behavior when the player rests at a bonfire.

isWeakSaint.Wiki: If enemy will be affected by weapons with antSaintDamageRate (holy damage).

isWeakA.Wiki: If enemy will be affected by weapons with antWeakA_DamageRate (occult damage).

isWeakB.Wiki: If enemy will be affected by weapons with antWeakB_DamageRate (anti-darkwraith damage).

disableInitializeDead.Wiki: If true, dead enemies will be alive again when the game is reset without respawning enemies (such as quitting to menu)
